docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Sophie Maroot's job begins at 7:30 A.M. Patients with severe diarrhea must be constantly cleaned. Some, stricken with dementia, repeatedly tear their respirators loose. Others must be restrained to keep them from wandering around out of the hospital. Almost all, vulnerable to common infections, require hourly rounds for medication.

headline.main: Dire Need For Nurses Is Perplexing To Hospitals
